#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector<vi >
#define pp pair<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ppl pair<ll,ll>
#define vl vector<ll>
#define vll vector<vl >
#define vb vector<bool>
#define llu unsigned ll
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define mod 1000000007
#define sc scanf
#define pf printf
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(!b)
		return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	ll temp=power(a,b/2);
	temp=(temp*temp);
	if(b&1)
		temp=(temp*a);
	return temp;
}
int mleft, mright, curr_ans, bsize, n;

vi bit;
typedef struct node
{
	int l, r, in;
}node;

class comp
{
	public:
		bool operator()(const node& a,const node& b)
		{
			if((a.l/bsize) ^ (b.l/bsize) )
				return ((a.l/bsize) < (b.l/bsize) );
			else
				return( a.r < b.r );
		}
};

void update( int index, int val )
{
	while( index <= n)
	{
		bit[index] += val;
		index += (index)&(-index);
	}
}

int query( int index)
{
	int sum = 0;
	while(index > 0)
	{
		sum += bit[index];
		index -= (index)&(-index);
	}
	return sum;
}

void update_range( int u, int val)
{
	update( u, val);
	update( n+1,-val);
}
void add_elem( int val, int type)
{
	update_range( val, 1);
/*	cout<<"after addition : the carray is\n";
	for( int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		cout << query(i) << " ";
	}
	cout << "\n";*/
	if( type == 1) // for right
		curr_ans += query(n) - query(val);
	else // for left
		curr_ans += query(val-1);
}

void remov_elem( int val, int type)
{
	if( type == 1) // for right
		curr_ans -= query(n) - query(val);
	else // for left
		curr_ans -= query(val-1);
	update_range( val, -1);
	/*	cout << "\n";
	cout<<"after removal : the carray is\n";
	for( int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		cout << query(i) << " ";
	}*/
	//cout << "removing ="<<curr_ans << "\n";
	
}

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int i, q, l, r, num;
	cin >> n;
	vi v( n);
	bit.resize( n+2);
	bsize = sqrt(n);
	map<int,vi > m;
	map<int,vi >::iterator it;
	for( i=0;i<n;i++ )
	{
			cin >> num;
			m[num].pb( i);
	}
	i = 1;
	vi::iterator vit;
	for( it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++ )
	{
		for( vit=(it->second).begin();vit!=(it->second).end();vit++ )
		{
			v[*vit] = i;
		}
		i++;
	}
/*	for( i=0;i<n;i++ )
	{
		cout << v[i]<<" ";
	}
	cout << "\n";*/
	cin >> q;
	node qr[q];
	mleft = 0;
	mright = -1;
	curr_ans = 0;
	for( i=0;i<q;i++ )
	{
		cin >> l >> r;
		l--;
		r--;
		qr[i].l = l;
		qr[i].r = r;
		qr[i].in = i;
	}
	sort( qr, qr+q, comp() );
	int ans[q];
	for( i=0;i<q;i++ )
	{
		l = qr[i].l;
		r = qr[i].r;
		while( mright < r)
		{
			add_elem( v[++mright], 1 );
		}
		while( mright > r)
		{
			remov_elem( v[mright--], 1 );
		}
		while( mleft < l)
		{
			remov_elem( v[mleft++], 2 );
		}
		while( mleft > l )
		{
			add_elem( v[--mleft], 2 );
		}
		ans[ qr[i].in] = curr_ans;
	}
	for( i=0;i<q;i++ )
		cout << ans[i] << "\n";
	//cin >> n;
    return 0;
}
